justification: “In all studies, we measured trait ambivalence using the Trait Ambivalence Scale, which we describe below.”

measured_by: Four-scenario attribution task (Kitayama et al., 2006 paradigm)
justification: “To measure participants' degree of correspondence bias, they read four scenarios … and calculated correspondence bias scores by subtracting the attribution to external factors from attribution to internal attributions.”

measured_by: Anagram success/failure attribution task (adapted from Sedikides et al., 1998)
justification: “To assess self-serving bias, we adapted a well-established paradigm (Sedikides et al., 1998)… we … obtained an overall self-serving bias score, where higher scores indicate more bias.”
